summary: Experience a new way to start Skyrim, an Akaviri Samurai in deep meditation with captivating traditional music of the Japanese Samurai.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Arial Black][center][color=deepskyblue]Experience a new way to start Skyrim, an Akaviri Samurai in deep meditation with captivating traditional music of the Japanese Samurai. [/font][/center][/color]
Dont forget to endorse if you like the mod!
[youtube]HXa4R99KTJg[/youtube]

Thanks to hothtrooper for allowing me to use his screenshot as a background.
